briefTitle: Recombinant Factor VIIa BI (rFVIIa BI) Treatment of Acute Bleeding Episodes Per an On-demand Regimen
officialTitle: A PHASE 3, PROSPECTIVE, OPEN-LABEL, RANDOMIZED STUDY TO EVALUATE SAFETY AND EFFICACY OF RECOMBINANT ACTIVATED FVII BI (rFVIIa BI) IN THE TREATMENT OF ACUTE BLEEDING EPISODES PER AN ON-DEMAND REGIMEN IN PATIENTS WITH HEMOPHILIA A OR B WITH INHIBITORS

arms.label: One dose of 270 µg/kg rFVIIa BI

summary: The purpose of the study is to determine the efficacy and safety of rFVIIa BI as part of a six-month on-demand treatment regimen in hemophilia A or B subjects with inhibitors.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Bleeding Episode With "Treatment Success"

effectByArm.arm: Arm 1: up to 3 x 90 Micrograms/kg rFVIIa BI
